profileAlternative.name: VIKASH KAMAL
profileAlternative.headline: Senior Talent Specialist at MongoDB
profileAlternative.summary:
MongoDB is the fastest-growing database on the planet and the MongoDB community is transforming industries with incredibly innovative applications with over 15 million downloads, thousands of customers, and over 1,000 technology and service partners.

Rankings:

1) MongoDB named a big data NoSQL leader by Forrester in Q3 2016
2) MongoDB was named to the 2017 CNBC Disruptor 50 list for the fourth year in a row.
3) Glassdoor ranked us one of the best places to work in 2015.

URL – www.mongodb.com
We're hiring: https://www.mongodb.com/careers

Mission: MongoDB unleashes the power of software and data for innovators everywhere.

positions.title: MongoDB
positions.description:
MongoDB's mission is to unleash the power of software and data for innovators everywhere. The most sophisticated organizations, from the largest global companies to cutting-edge startups, use MongoDB to drive their business. MongoDB is the world's most popular next-generation database, with over 18 million downloads, thousands of customers, and over 1,000 technology and service partners.

Utilize advanced SEO solutions to MongoDB jobs on, and recruit candidates from, social and professional networking sites including LinkedIn, Quora, Github and StackOverflow.

Recruiting IT staff for vacancies and locations throughout the US, India, Europe and globally.

Cloud Services:
- Software Engineering/development
- Site Reliability (Linux/AWS/Chef/Python)
- UI Engineering (React, Node, D3, Backbone)
- Project Management

Server Team:
- Software Engineering (C/C++)
- Build / Release (Linux/AWS/Chef/Python)

Internal Systems:
- Systems Engineering / DevOps (Linux/AWS/Chef/Python)
- Internal Tools Development (Python, Java, Javascript, REST, Docker)
- IT Engineering

Technical Services:
- Technical Services Engineering
- Consulting Engineering

…
see more

positions.title: Team Lead Recruitment
positions.description:
Tech-Pro is a privately owned Information Technology Consulting Firm specializing in staff augmentation as well as solution based project work. Since being founded in 1989 and headquartered in the Saint Paul/Minneapolis area, Tech-Pro has continuously provided IT resources to many Fortune 100 & 500 companies, both within the twin cities market as well as nationwide.

Tech-Pro Consultants’ core competencies include Project Management, Business Analysis, Quality Assurance, Infrastructure Services as well as Microsoft and Java Application Development.

What makes Tech-Pro different is its dedication to the consultant and client; we work hard to ensure the best possible service is being provided to the client, and the best possible job opportunity is being provided to the consultant.
…
see more

given.text: Vikash, I have worked with him in tech-pro & he is a Great Leader, motivator & has awesome energy that radiates to everyone associated with him. He is result oriented and achieves his targets with ease through his hard work. Vikash is dependable & undoubtedly a great asset to any team.

Vikash is goal oriented Sr. Recruiter, I worked with him around 1 year. He is pretty much open to work on any IT/Non-IT requirements but what I have practically seen is, he has got master skills to work on any IT Developer positions and he always give the best match to his clients, he has good understanding of technologies, like Programming languages, Databases etc. He is very nice guy, professionally as well as personally! I would highly recommend him and wish him luck for his future growth!!!
…
See more

Vikash is an excellent recruiter with exceptional abilities in matching the right candidates for the right job. He is skilled in finding candidates for challenging requirements and has been very successful in his job. He is hard working and has got great aptitude skills and is a quick learner. Vikash is reliable, punctual and a highly dedicated individual. He is one of the most dedicated people I have ever met. He never hesitates to put in extra time to make sure the job is done right - and he always produces quality. Extremely conscientious and extremely helpful, it is a pleasure to work with Vikash. He builds quality relationships with everyone around him and he is truly an asset to any team.
…
See more

““Hard working, sincere, committed to get the taste of success in profession are few attributes of him. He is good in building and maintaining professional network, which is important part per his role. In addition to all above, he has "WILL TO DO" attitude which is indeed a great thing to have for anything. My best wishes to him for all his future endeavors !!!””

Vikash is a an energetic and enthusiastic IT Recruiter who takes initiatives and challenges seriously and completes them in a timely manner. He is hardworking and focused on his tasks and a good team player. I have seen him going extra miles to achieve his goals. He is one of star performer in our team and I wish him many more success in his future.... :)
…
See more

“Vikash is a very personable competent individual. He has the skill sets that make him a reliable and effective recruiter. It is a pleasure working with him. Always a plus to an organization. He is a fun person to interact with. Having Positive attitude he is really a determined and dynamic personality. Believes in hard work doing smartly. I would recommend him for a role that involves handling & recruiting technical positions in an organization...!”
…
See more

Vikash is a great person with so much of professional attitude that once he starts of his schedule for the day then he forgets when the day has ended.He possesses immense knowledge and is always willing to learn new things.

received.text:
Arjun is a very talented guy, he is a very high-end Recruiter, I have witnessed his problem-solving skills and sourcing skills, they are excellent. He provides the best solutions of very complex problems. He has the guts to leverage the task from the team and assist them to learn as well.
I acknowledge his talent and high-end recruiting skills.

Akshay is a very hardworking professional and his dedication towards his work is the best part of him. With a strong dedication, he has the capability to serve any kind of IT requirement that comes his way. He is a very sincere and dedicated resource. A very quick learner. Worked on stringent deadlines. Here is a recruiter that I won’t have any hesitation to recommend to anyone who is looking for someone from the top drawer. You will for sure get someone who is totally committed, who is smart and who will go to all lengths to get results. 
He is a well-versed individual with a multi-faceted skill set. I wish him success in all his future endeavours. Keep up good work Akshay and all the best for Life.
